Sample Diet Chart
----------------------------
 --> Breakfast at 8.30 am: 1 medium-sized boiled potato,1 teaspoon of low-fat butter.
 --> Brunch at 10.30 am: Salad Lettuce or Kale,1 bowl of cabbage
 --> Lunch at 12 noon: 1 onion, 1 cucumber, 1/2 carrot,2 glasses of water.
 --> Afternoon Snack at 4.00pm : 1/2 cup of sliced capsicum, 1 cup of boiled broccoli
 --> Evening Snack at 6.30pm:1 cup of boiled cauliflower and a glass of water.
 -->Dinner at 8.00pm: Mixture of boiled green beans, broccoli, carrot and beet with 2 glasses of water.
